trans-unit.source: Specifies the edge or edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface where design-time processing is performed, such as a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> location on the activity designer.

The enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A> that specifies where on the activity designer a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> or a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects reside.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A> method can be used to retrieve this collection.

You can also use it to determine which edge or edges of an activity designer a user is resizing by observing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges> enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.
All edges of the activity designer.
The bottom edge of the activity designer.
The left edge of the activity designer.
None of the edges of the activity designer.
The right edge of the activity designer.
The top edge of the activity designer.
